Articles.Content:
First and foremost, if this is the wrong area to post this type of request, I apologize. It seemed the most practical place at the time.

I do a lot of customizing of parts and sizes in my game and was wanting to toy with creating an agency for my own use. However, when it comes to creating a logo, my artistic skills and creativity are dearly found wanting. Would anyone be so kind as to create or suggest some ideas on a logo for company named "ZLZ Mineral Exploration Ltd." that I could place in my game? Format of this company is based around the advancement of technology of planetary geology and the mineral exploration and mining of off world sources.

I am open to any suggestions or ideas and thank you in advance!
